projects.title: Cloud-Native Microservices Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a cloud-native microservices platform using Kubernetes, Docker, and Node.js. Features include service discovery, load balancing, and automated scaling. Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and ArgoCD.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Built a real-time analytics dashboard processing millions of events per second. Utilized WebSocket for live updates, implemented data aggregation with Redis, and created interactive visualizations with D3.js.

projects.title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
projects.shortDescription: Machine learning tool for automated code reviews
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered code review assistant that analyzes pull requests, suggests improvements, and detects potential bugs. Integrated with GitHub API and implemented custom machine learning models for code analysis.
